dict.acceptation: 叉（挖掘用的园艺工具）；餐叉；叉状物；（自行车或摩托车的）车叉子；

sent.orig: Multi-process jobs are not allowed. This includes system calls such as fork, exec, and system.
sent.trans: 不支持多进程任务。这包括诸如fork,exec,和system等系统调用。

sent.orig: This includes system calls such as fork, exec, and system.
sent.trans: 这包括诸如fork,exec,和system等系统调用。

sent.orig: The Fork-Join structure is one of the basic modeling structures for parallel processing.
sent.trans: fork-join任务图是一种并行处理的基本结构。

sent.orig: He stabbed the meat with his fork/stabbed his fork into the meat.
Fish fork: in place of the dinner fork when fish is served.
sent.trans: 鱼餐叉：吃鱼的时候，鱼餐叉是用来替代正餐叉的。
